name: Blood Harvest (itch)
description:
An easy point-and-click game focused on gardening and selling

The zombie apocalypse has broken out and humans have been forced into hiding. Though your grandfather has been running this farm for ages. He's not going to go into hiding, instead, he's started growing... limbs? 

Your grandfather has decided it's time to go into retirement and leave the business to you! 

Pant, grow, harvest, and sell to the local zombies. Eyes, legs, arms, toes, and fingers! Everything a zombie might need to keep living in this new world!

Whatever you do... don't take off your pumpkin.

CONTROLS

Easy point-and-click game. 

Go through the daily tasks and sell in your store to complete the day and move on to the next day. 

TEAM

UBM Studios is a self proclaimed studio created by students at Webster University. The team consists of the members who created "Blood Harvest": 

William Legens

Dylan AuBuchoon

Thomas Kinney

Orion Allman 

AJ Meyers 

Shelby Lodewyks
